comment: Well it's like any large corporation. Upper management hopes the have the smart people come up with well documented processes that removes the need for smart people so you can hire cheap dumb drones to just follow process. This never works very well in reality, we'll have the Wall Mart of militaries. I'm sure someone will get rich off the whole thing though
